DOC.brief_summary: This study open-label , randomize , multi-center study conduct typical psychiatric outpatient practice China . This study intend collect data efficacy safety venlafaxine XR ( Efexor XR® ) versus SSRIs conventional antidepressant depress patient previously fail antidepressant treatment . This data use guide psychiatrist recommendation clinic use .
DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing Efficacy Venlafaxine XR Vs. SSRIs Conventional Antidepressants Depressed Patients
DOC.criteria: Main Males female , 18 65 year age Outpatients Major depressive disorder base DSMIV criteria The baseline score 17item HAMD³17 Switchers prior antidepressant , satisfactory improvement ( normally minimum 8weeks treatment ) , approve antidepressant medication experience intolerance due side effect antidepressant medication base clinical discretion Provide write informed consent If female childbearing potential , must confirm pregnancy baseline , use medically acceptable method contraception throughout study . Main Hypersensitivity venlafaxine ; Clinically significant renal hepatic disease medical disease , opinion investigator , might compromise study , include seizure Alcohol drug abuse within last year A recent history myocardial infarction unstable heart disease ( within 6 month baseline ) Bipolar disorder For female , know suspected pregnancy breast feeding Use monoamine oxidase inhibitor ( MAOI ) within 14 day baseline ; use investigational drug within 30 day baseline . Patients prior use venlafaxine use venlafaxine current episode .
